sentence.Network_en: Many men before Gautama in that land of uneventful sunshine had found life distressing and mysterious.
sentence.Network_cn: 在这一片平安无事的,阳光和煦的土地上,早在乔答摩之前就有许多人发现生活是烦恼而神秘的.

sentence.Network_en: He is the founder of Buddhism, and was called Siddhartha Gautama.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是佛教的创始人, 叫乔达摩·悉达多.

sentence.Network_en: Could the flash of wisdom that came over Siddhartha Gautama?
sentence.Network_cn: 悉达多·高多玛(释迦牟尼之俗姓)抓住了智慧的闪现?

auth_sentence.content: In captivity, she had practiced vipasanna meditation, an ancient technique attributed to the Gautama Buddha.
